events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and now I want to return it because it doesn't fit well and the color is different from what I expected.
System flagged this issue as Refund based on customer's request about returning the jacket and refund process.
Customer support agent Susan has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket return case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m Susan and I will assist you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with all tags attached?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and tags are still attached. I can ship it back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you a prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks a lot, Susan! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid shipping label offer.
I have just sent the return shipping label to your email. Once you ship the jacket back, we will initiate your refund immediately.
Just following up to confirm whether you have sent the jacket back and if you have received any updates on the refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday and I already received the refund in my bank account. Thank you for your help!
Glad to hear that your refund was processed successfully. I’m closing your case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
